changes.description: Add structure state change notifications
Add details column and info dialog for upwell structures
Add POS timer column and info dialog
Add POS fuel time calculation and display
Add starbase (POS) support to structures tab
Add selective cache clearing modal
Add error limit tracking per ESI best practices
Add global resolution and smart detail caching
Improve reliability and efficiency
Preserve towerSize/fuelTier when fetching prices
Add missing notifyListeners and parallelize clearing
Add global backoff on 429 for all queues
Don't block ESI on type resolution
Handle 304 responses when cache entry is expired
Preserve etags for conditional requests after cache expiry
Use owner type for items endpoint and resolve issuer names
Show blueprint copies correctly in contract items
Parallelize reference data resolution
Extract shared constants, utilities, and table components
Use dynamic rate limiting from headers only
